62f6f41392b5.title: Prevention: Configuration Fix Pattern
62f6f41392b5.description: Implementing prevention measures for recurring configuration fixes
prevention_measures: Verify configuration file syntax before applying changes
Test configuration in isolated environment first
Document configuration changes with version control
